tech.name: Troop Transports

tech.effect: If you have a seat on the High Council: +4 Swords

tech.name: Detonation Devices
tech.effect: When you win a Conflict using a dreadnought, you may return a dreadnought to your supply to gain +1 Victory Point instead of taking control of a board space with it.

tech.name: Holoprojectors
tech.effect: Once per round: Discard a card to draw a card.

tech.name: Invasion Ships
tech.effect: Once per round: Discard a card so that enemy Agents don't block your Agent this turn.

tech.name: Shuttle Fleet
tech.effect: Round start: +2 Solari

tech.name: Disposal Facility

tech.name: Holtsman Engine
tech.effect: Round start: Draw a card. Endgame: Worth 1 Victory Point if you have at least two The Spice Must Flow.

tech.name: Artillery

tech.name: Sonic Snoopers

tech.name: Memocorders

tech.name: Spy Satellites

tech.name: Training Depot
tech.effect: Reveal turn: If you have 6+ Persuasion or more, you add two swords to your Combat strength.

tech.name: Gene-Locked Vault
tech.effect: Your intrigue cards can't be stolen unless you have 5+.

tech.name: Glowglobes
tech.effect: You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.

tech.name: Planetary Array
tech.effect: When you win a conflict, draw 1 card.

tech.name: Servo-Receivers

tech.name: Delivery Bay

tech.name: Suspensor Suits

tech.effect: Agent turn: Flip to deploy troops.

tech.name: Self-Destroying Messages
tech.effect: Reveal turn: +1 Persuasion.

tech.name: Navigation Chamber

tech.name: Advanced Data Analysis
tech.effect: To acquire this, you must trash one of your Spies from the board. Once per round: +1 Intrigue card.

tech.name: Ornithopter Fleet
tech.effect: All of your battle icons are now Ornithopters.

tech.name: Panopticon
tech.effect: Reveal turn: +1 Spy and +1 Troop. Endgame: Gain 1 Influence with each Faction where you have 1 or less Influence.

tech.name: Spy Drones

tech.name: CHOAM Transports

contracts.name: Deliver Supplies
contracts.reward: +1 Solari and +1 Spy with Deep Cover

contracts.name: Immediate
contracts.reward: Trash 1 Intrigue card -> +1 Intrigue card and Draw a card (requires an Intrigue card)

sardaukar.name: Canny
sardaukar.effect: If you have an Agent on a green board space: +2 Swords.

sardaukar.name: Loyal
sardaukar.effect: If you have 3+ Influence with the Emperor: +2 Swords.

sardaukar.name: Fierce
sardaukar.effect: +1 Sword. If any opponent has a sandworm in the Conflict: +1 Sword.

navigation.name: +2 Solari. If this is in Navigation slot 4: For the rest of the game, during each of your Reveal turns, +1 Persuasion.
Trash a card. If you trash a card that costs 1+ Persuasion: +2 Spice.
+1 Water. If you played this as a result of reaching 2 Influence with the Spacing Guild: +1 Spice.
+1 Spice OR Pay 2 Solari -> Gain 1 Influence with a different Faction where you have 2+ Influence.
+1 Spice OR If this is in Navigation slot 1: Pay 1 Water -> Acquire The Spice Must Flow.
+1 Spice. If you have an Alliance: +1 Intrigue.
Lose 1 Influence with any faction -> Gain 1 influence with any faction.
Draw 1 card OR Spend 5 Spice -> +1 Victory Point.
+1 Spy OR Recall a spy -> +1 Intrigue and +2 Spice.

leader.name: Duke Leto Atreides
leader.leader_ability: Landsraad Popularity: Sending an Agent to a Green board space costs you 1 Solari less.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Prudent Diplomacy: Pay 1 Spice: Gain 1 Influence with a Faction where an opponent has more than you.

leader.name: Paul Atreides
leader.leader_ability: Prescience: You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.

leader.signet_ring_ability: Lead the Way: +1 Draw

leader.name: Gurney Halleck
leader.leader_ability: Always Smiling: If you have 6 or more strength in the Conflict (10 in a six-player game): +1 Persuasion
leader.signet_ring_ability: Warmaster: +1 Troop

leader.name: Lady Jessica
leader.leader_ability: Other Memories: When you send an Agent to a Bene Gesserit board space, you may return all your memories to your supply, drawing a card for each one. Then flip this Leader over.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Spice Agony: Trade 1 Spice for 1 Intrigue card and move a troop from your supply to the Bene Gesserit area of the board. It is now a memory.

leader.name: Shaddam Corrino IV
leader.leader_ability: Sardaukar Commander: Set aside both Sardaukar contracts. Only you can acquire them during the game.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Emperor of the Known Universe: Units can't be deployed to the Conflict this turn. +1 Solari and +1 Troop OR trade 3 Solari for +1 Influence

leader.name: Princess Irulan
leader.leader_ability: Imperial Birthright: When you reach 2 Influence with the Emperor: +1 Intrigue
leader.signet_ring_ability: Chronicler's Insight: You may choose: Acquire a card that costs 1 Persuasion OR trash a card from your hand. If it has a cost of 1+ Persuasion: +2 Spice

leader.signet_ring_ability:
Conscript: You may acquire a card
that costs 3 Persuation or les.

leader.signet_ring_ability: Guild Contacts: Pay 1 Solari: Gain 1 Foldspace card.

leader.name: Lady Margot Fenring
leader.leader_ability: Loyalty: When you reach 2 Influence with the the Bene Gesserit, +2 Spice.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Arrakis Informant: +1 Spy on any purple space.

leader.name: Baron Vladimir Harkonnen

Masterstroke: Once per game:

leader.signet_ring_ability: Scheme: Pay 1 Solari: Draw 1 Intrigue card.

leader.name: Glossu “The Beast” Rabban

leader.signet_ring_ability:
Brutality: +1 Troop or +2 Troops
if you have at least 1 Faction Alliance.

leader.name: Feyd-Rautha Harkonnen
leader.leader_ability: Devious Strength: Reveal Turn: Recall a Spy for 2 Strength.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Personal Training: Move your Feyd token one space to the right on your Training track, earning the reward on the new space.

leader.name: Lady Amber Metulli
leader.leader_ability: Desert Scouts: Reveal Turn: You may retreat one of your troops.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Fill Coffers: +1 Solari and if you have an Alliance: +1 Spice

leader.name: Princess Yuna Moritani
leader.leader_ability: Smuggling Operation: At game start: no Water. When you gain Solari on your turn, gain +1 Solari.
leader.signet_ring_ability:
Final Delivery: Pay 7 Solari:
Gain +1 Influence, +1 Troop, +1 Spice

leader.name: Viscount Hundro Moritani
leader.leader_ability: Intelligence: At game start: Look at the top 2 cards of the Intrigue deck. Keep 1, put the other back on top.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Couriers: Pay 1 Spice: +1 Dreadnought

leader.name: Helena Richese
leader.leader_ability: Eyes Everywhere: Enemy Agents don't block your Agents at Green or Blue board spaces.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Manipulate: Remove a card in the Imperium Row. You may acquire this  card for 1 Persuation less.

leader.name: Count Ilban Richese
leader.leader_ability: Ruthless Negotiator: When you pay Solari for the cost of a board Space: Draw 1 card.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Manufacturing: +1 Solari

leader.name: Countess Ariana Thorvald
leader.leader_ability:
Spice Addict: When you harvest spice:
gain 1 less spice and draw 1 card.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Hidden Reservoir: +1 Water

leader.name: Earl Memnon Thorvald
leader.leader_ability: Connections: When you take a High Counsil seat: Gain +1 Influence.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Spice Hoard: +1 Spice.

leader.name: Tessia Vernius
leader.leader_ability: Careful Observation: Use Snooper tokens on the Influence track to gain rewards.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Duplicity: Lose 1 Influence: Gain 1 Influence with a Faction where you have a Snooper token.

leader.name: Prince Rhombur Vernius
leader.leader_ability: Heavy Lasgun Cannons: Your dreadnoughts have 4 Swords (instead of 3).
leader.signet_ring_ability: Ixian Technology: Acquire Tech or Tech Negotiation.

leader.name: Staban Tuek
leader.starting_effect: Limited Allies: You start the game without Diplomacy in your deck.
leader.leader_ability: Smuggle Spice: Whenever another player sends an Agent to a Maker board space you are spying on: +1 Spice.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Unseen Network: +1 Spy. If placed on green, you may trade 1 Spice for 3 Solari. If placed on a Faction space, you may trade 2 Solari for 1 Intrigue card.

leader.name: Duncan Idaho
leader.leader_ability: Ginaz Swordmaster: The Swordmaster boardspace costs you 2 Solari less.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Into the Fray: You may take an Agent you sent this turn and deploy it to the Conflict as a 2 strength unit that can't be retreated. If you have your Swordmaster, it has 3 strength instead.

leader.name: Chani
leader.leader_ability: Tactician: Whenever you retreat or lose any number of troops from the Conflict, advance your Tactics token that many spaces, earning rewards as you reach them. Reset the token after reaching the end of the track.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Fedaykin Maneuver: Retreat any number of your troops OR If you have 2+ Influnece with the Fremen, trade 1 Water for 2 card Draws.

leader.name: Piter de Vries
leader.starting_effect: Twisted Genius: Shuffle the Twisted Intrigue deck and place it face down near you.
leader.leader_ability: Twisted Genius: Round Start: Draw a Twisted Intrigue card. (These count as Intrigue cards and can be stolen)
leader.signet_ring_ability: Harkonnen Advisor: +1 Troop. You can't deploy this troop to the Conflict this turn.

leader.name: Esmar Tuek
leader.leader_ability: Tuek's Sietch: Whenever you send an Agent to Tuek's Sietch: +1 Solari. Whenever an opponent sends an Agent there: +1 Intrigue.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Smuggle Spice: Place 1 bonus spice on Tuek's Sietch OR Take 1 bonus spice from a Maker board space.

leader.name: Steersman Y'rkoon
leader.starting_effect:
Strange Form: You start the game with no Water and no Signet Ring in your deck. 

Plot Course: Shuffle the Navigation cards and draw a hand of five. Choose four to place face down above, in order. Return all others to the box. Whenever you reach 2 Influence with a Faction, play the next Navigation card above (starting from the left).
leader.leader_ability: Hungry for Spice: Whenever you gain 3+ spice in a single turn, Draw 1 card.

leader.name: Count Hasimir Fenring
leader.leader_ability: Assassin: Whenever you trash a card: +1 Solari.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Corrino Liason: You may trash a card in your play area OR Place 1 Spy with Deep Cover on the Emperor board area.

leader.name: Gaius Helen Mohiam
leader.leader_ability: Clandestine: Each card you play has the Spy icon. Whenever you could recall a Spy to Gather Intelligence, you must.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Listeners: Place 1 Spy on a Green space OR Pay 1 Spice -> +1 Spy.

leader.name: Liet Kynes
leader.leader_ability: Arrakis Planetologist: Ignore the Influence requirement of Sietch Tabr. You summon no sandworms. For each one you would, instead: Trash 1 card, +1 Spice, +1 Intrigue (even when the Conflict is protected by the Shield Wall).
leader.signet_ring_ability: Judge of the Change: If you sent an Agent this turn to: Green board space AND 2+ Influence with the Emperor -> +1 Water; Purple board space -> +1 Solari; Yellow board space: +1 Spice.

leader.name: Kota Odax of Ix
leader.starting_effect: Secret Project: Peek at the bottom Tech tile of each stack. Place one face down here.
leader.leader_ability: Secret Project: Whenever you could acquire a Tech tile, you may choose the one you set aside. It costs 1 Spice less.
leader.signet_ring_ability: Reverse Engineering: +1 Spice OR Trash one of your Tech tiles -> +1 Intrigue and Draw 1 card.

conflict.name: Skirmish
conflict.first_place: +1 Influence and +1 Spice

conflict.name: Skirmish
conflict.first_place: +1 Victory point

conflict.name: Skirmish
conflict.first_place: +1 Influence and +2 Solari

conflict.name: Skirmish
conflict.first_place: +1 Victory point

conflict.name: Cloak and Dagger
conflict.first_place: +1 Influence and +2 Intrigue cards

conflict.name: Desert Power
conflict.first_place: +1 Victory point and +1 Water

conflict.name: Guild Bank Raid
conflict.first_place: +6 Solari

conflict.name: Machinations
conflict.first_place:
Choose two of the 4 Factions.
Gain +1 Influence in each.

conflict.name: Raid Stockpiles
conflict.first_place: +1 Intrigue card and +3 Spice

conflict.name: Secure Imperial Basin
conflict.first_place:
+1 Victory point and Imperial Basin Control
(Gain Imperial Basin bonus when sending Agent)

conflict.name: Sieg of Arrakeen
conflict.first_place:
+1 Victory point and Arrakeen Control
(Gain Arrakeen bonus when sending Agent)

conflict.name: Siege of Carthag
conflict.first_place:
+1 Victory point and Carthag Control
(Gain Carthag bonus when sending Agent)

conflict.name: Sort Through the Chaos
conflict.first_place:
Mentat and +1 Intrigue and +1 Solari
(Take the Mentat for the next round)

conflict.name: Terrible Purpose
conflict.first_place:
+1 Victory point and Trash a card
(Trashing is optional)

conflict.name: Battle for Arrakeen
conflict.first_place:
+2 Victory points and Arrakeen Control
(Gain Arrakeen bonus when sending Agent)
conflict.second_place: +1 Intrigue card and +2 Spice and +3 Solari

conflict.name: Battle for Carthag
conflict.first_place:
+2 Victory points and Carthag Control
(Gain Carthag bonus when sending Agent)

conflict.name: Battle for Imperial Basin
conflict.first_place:
+2 Victory points and Imperal Basin Control
(Gain Imperial Basin bonus when sending Agent)

conflict.name: Grand Vision
conflict.first_place: +2 Influence and +1 Intrigue card

conflict.name: Skirmish
conflict.first_place: Trash a card

conflict.name: Storms in the South
conflict.first_place: +1 Spy with Deep Cover and +2 Spice

rival.name: Gurney Halleck
rival.scheme_ability: Gain one influence with the Faction where Gurney has the most Influence

rival.name: Lady Amber Metulli
rival.notes: Lady Amber doesn't score points. Once she has gained her Swordmaster, she stops collecting resources.

rival.name: Muad'Dib
rival.scheme_ability: Maker Hooks, Detonate Shield Wall, Intrigue card
